utterance.speaker: Jay Leno
utterance.content: Is there any entertainment there? What are people doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Here we go! 1999! The year of Joey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're very happy for you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's the matter?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We wanted to kiss at midnight, but nobody else is going to so y'know…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I'll take care of it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no, wait! Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross! Ross! Ross, listen! Who are you kissing at midnight, huh? Rachel or Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well you gotta kiss someone, you can't kiss your sister.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, who's gonna kiss my sister.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Awww, man! Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude-dude, who would you rather have kiss your sister, me or Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's a good point.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh well, since I have that whole history with Rachel, I guess Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pheebs! Pheebs! Ross wants to kiss you at midnight!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's so obvious, why doesn't he just ask?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach! Rach! Listen, I'm gonna kiss you at midnight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, everyone's gotta kiss someone. You can't kiss Ross you got the history.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So? Who would you rather have kiss you, me or Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, good point.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: 3! 2! 1! HAPPY NEW YEAR!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Happy New Year!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Happy New Year.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Happy New Year, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You too!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Happy New Year, Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So did that do anything for ya?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what? I'm gonna go out on a limb and say no divorces in '99!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But your divorce isn't even final yet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Just the one divorce in '99! Y'know what, I am gonna be happy this year. I am gonna make myself happy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you want us to leave the room, or?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Everyday I am gonna do one thing that I haven't done before. That my friends is my New Year's resolution.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh! That's a good one! Mine is to pilot a commercial jet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's good one too, Pheebs. Now all you have to do is find a planeload of people who's resolution is to plummet to their deaths.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe your resolution is to not make fun of your friends, especially the ones who may soon be flying you to Europe for free on their own plane.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She has a better chance of sprouting wings and flying up your nose than you do of not making fun of us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: In fact, I'll bet you 50 bucks that you can't go the whole year without making fun of us. Eh, y'know what, better yet? A week.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll take that bet my friend. And you know what, paying me the 50 bucks could be the "new thing you do that day!" And it starts right now!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, my New Year's resolution is to learn how to play the guitar.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really?! How come?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, y'know those special skills I have listed on my resume? I would love it would be great if one of those was true.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Do you want me to teach you? I'm a great teacher.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? Who-who have you taught?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I taught me and I love me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah that'd be great! Thanks Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Op, look! Claire forgot her glasses! And she's gonna be really needing these to keep an eye on that boyfriend, who, I hear, needs to keep his stapler in his desk drawer, if you know what I'm talking about.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, maybe your resolution should be to umm, gossip less.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't gossip!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, maybe sometimes I find out things or I hear something and I pass that information on y'know kinda like a public service, it doesn't mean I'm a gossip. I mean, would you call Ted Kopel a gossip?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well if Ted Kopel talked about his coworkers botched boob jobs, I would.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? They were like this!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: I'll see you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just asked that girl out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nice!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice!! Yeah! Is that part of your resolution, your new thing for today?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes it is. See.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Elizabeth Hornswoggle?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's right, uh, Elizabeth Hornswoggle.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Horn-swoggle.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You all right Chandler? Is there something funny about that name?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No, I just think that maybe I-I'd heard it somewhere before.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh really! Where? Somewhere funny I'd bet!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi, Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh, guess what? I-I have a date with Elizabeth Hornswoggle.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hornswoggle? Ooh, this must be killing you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, see you later.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See ya! All right Pheebs, I am ready for my first lesson.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Oh no-no-no, you don't touch the guitar! First you learn here, then you learn here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm, okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, lesson one: chords. Now, I don't know the actual names of the chords but umm, I-I-I made up names for the way my hand looks while I'm doing them. So then, this is Bear Claw. Okay, umm, Turkey Leg and Old Lady.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What an interesting approach to guitar instruction. Y'know some might find it amusing, I myself find it regular.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey everybody, Rachel was so good today. She didn't gossip at all.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I didn’t! Even when I found out…umm, all right, well let's just say I found something out something about someone and let's just say she's gonna keep it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs! Check-check this out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, you nailed the Old Lady!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah listen so, I thought I was getting better, so on my way home today I stopped by this guitar store and…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Did you, did you touch any of the guitars while you were there? Did you?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Give me your hands. Strings. Gimme it! Pick. Do you want to learn to play guitar?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then don't touch one!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Ben!

utterance.speaker: Ben
utterance.content: Auntie Monica!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross is wearing leather pants! Does nobody else see that Ross is wearing leather pants? Someone comment on the pants!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I think they're very nice.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I like 'em.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I like them a lot.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's not what I had in mind! See, people like Ross don't generally wear these types of pants. You see, they're very tight. Maybe there's something in that area.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh see, I-I needed a new thing for today and there's this leather store that always smells so good and I thought to myself, "Wow, I never really owned a good smelling pair of pants before."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh come on!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, seriously, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You look like a freak.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Awful, absolutely awful.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's my New Year's resolution!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, to blind my child?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! To take more pictures of all of us together. I mean I really think it's the best resolution because everyone will enjoy the pictures.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, everyone will enjoy my music as well.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My God! These pants are burning up! Oh come on, she wants to snuggle now! What is she trying to kill me? It's like a volcano in here! Are you hot?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth Hornswoggle
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, it must just be me then.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That was just the pants on the couch. Umm, hey, do you, do you mind if I use your bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: No, go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh……….

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Hey, my favorite part is coming up!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 'Kay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Tiger! Dragon! Iceberg!! Joseph, did you even study at all last night?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes! Yes, I did.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then do Iceberg!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: G-sharp.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: G-sharp? Have you been studying the real names of the chords? Have you? Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! I didn't touch a guitar!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, but you're questioning my method!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I'm not questioning it, I'm saying it's stupid! What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know none of my other student thought I was stupid.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Your other student, was you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, well, y'know maybe you just need to try a little harder!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, maybe I need to try a real teacher! Right here! Here! Andy Cooper, he teaches guitar and look ooh, there's a nice picture of him with a little kid and THE KID'S GOT A GUITAR!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine! You go learn from your qualified instructor! But don't come crying to me when everyone's sick and tired of hearing you play Bad, Bad Leroy Brown!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: "Baddest man in the whole damn town."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, fine! Take his side!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't wait to be with you! I'll sneak over as soon as Ross picks up Ben. I'll just tell Rachel I'm gonna be doing laundry for a couple of hours.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Laundry. Huh. Is that my new nickname?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Awww, y'know what your nickname is, Mr. Big…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Arghh!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, it's Ross! I need some help!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, Chandler's not here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, you can help me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, I'm in Elizabeth's bathroom…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I-I got really hot in my leather pants so I took them off but they must have shrunk from the-the sweat or-or-or my legs expanded from the heat. Look, I-I can't put them back on. I can't!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. That is quite a situation. Uh, do you see any like, powder?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Powder! Yeah! Yeah, I have powder!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good-good, okay, sprinkle some of that on your legs, it'll absorb some of the moisture and then you can get your pants back up.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, okay, hold on! They're not coming on man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm, do you see any—oh, Vaseline?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, I-I see lotion, I have lotion! Will that work?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, sure, spread some of that on there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hold on.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross? You okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: They're still, they're still not coming on man and the lotion and the powder have made a paste!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?! Uhh, what color is it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What difference does that make?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm just—if the paste matches the pants, you can make yourself a pair of paste pants and she won't know the difference!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, do you have a minute?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, what am I gonna…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, Rachel's here, so good luck man, let me know how it works out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Joey, I have such a problem!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh well, you're timing couldn't be better. I am putting out fires all over the place.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Okay. Joey, I have got to tell you something!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What-what is it, what is it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, it's so huge, but you just have to promise me that you cannot tell anyone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no, no-no-no-no! I don't want to know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes! Yes! Yes, you do want to know! This is unbelievable!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't care, Rach! Look, I am tired of being the guy who knows all the secrets but can't tell anyone!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? What secrets? You know secrets? What are they?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And you're not supposed to be gossiping!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I know! I just can't keep this one in, so I pick up the phone…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm not listening to you!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ross, umm, you've been in there for a long time. I'm starting to get kinda freaked out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, I'm coming out. Hey, can you turn the lights off.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: No, let's just leave the lights on.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I had a problem.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I can't talk to you! I don't have a fancy ad in the Yellow Pages!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, Pheebs, I just, I wanna apologize for, for saying that your method was stupid and-and maybe ask you to be my teacher again. And-and I promise, I won't touch a guitar until you say I'm ready. You really think I'm ready?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Cool!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Was the chord at least right…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We heard about your pants, I'm so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This year was supposed to be great! But, it's only the second day and I'm a loser with stupid leather pants that don't even fit!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No. No, you're not a loser.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look at me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, hey, look. Look Ross, Ben drew a picture of you! Huh? You're-you're a cowboy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, be-because of the leather pants.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See? Ben doesn't think you're a loser, he thinks you're a cowboy! Now that's something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That really is something; that's really cool.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Howdy partner!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe I should get another pair! Ooh, y'know, they-they had some with fringe all down the sides. I'm gonna go kiss Ben goodnight. I can't believe he thinks I'm a cowboy. I would make a good cowboy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, now that everything's wrapped up here, I think I'm, I'm gonna go do my laundry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, me too. Y'know if this shirt is dirty. Yep.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I'm gonna go too. I'm gonna go to the airport. I figure if I hang around there long enough, someone's bound to leave one of those planes unattended.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good luck, honey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, uh, Joey?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Umm?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Remember that big thing I was gonna tell you about?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, no!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm not gonna tell you, but if you found out on your own, that would be okay and then we could talk about it. Right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, then it wouldn't be a secret. So yeah, that would be okay. Yeah. Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Well. Hey uh Joe, would mind going over to Chandler's bedroom and get that book back that he borrowed from me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now? You want me to go over there now?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Do you know something?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you know something?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I might know something.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I might know something too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's the thing you know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, I can't tell you until you tell me what you know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't tell you what I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well then I can't tell you what I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You don't know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, how about I go over there and I will walk into Chandler's bedroom and I will see that thing that I think that I know is actually the thing that I think that I know!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: YOU KNOW!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: AND YOU KNOW!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I know!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Chandler and Monica?!! Oh, this is unbelievable!! How long have you known?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Too long! Oh my God, Rach, I've been dying to talk to someone about this for so long! Listen, listen, we can't say anything about this to anybody, they're so weird about that! Listen…

utterance.speaker: Joey and Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! It's raining. I don't want to fly in the rain. So…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I am going to go for a walk in the rain.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh, yeah, me too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's weird. I bet they're doing it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh good, okay, I can't take it anymore. I can't take it anymore. So you win, okay? Here! Pheebs? Flying a jet? Better make it a spaceship so that you can get back to your home planet! And Ross, phone call for you today, Tom Jones, he wants his pants back! And Hornswoggle? What are you dating a character from Fraggile Rock?!
